amendment.description: To provide funds for bycatch reduction devices for shrimpers in areas of the Gulf Coast impacted by Hurricanes Rita and Katrina.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3228 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3228 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S12913-12914) To provide funds for bycatch reduction devices for shrimpers in areas of the Gulf Coast impacted by Hurricanes Rita and Katrina.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3228 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3228 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
